TEXT.TITLE: FIRST NATIONAL BANK OF BOSTON <BKB> RAISES PRIME
TEXT.BODY: The First National Bank of Boston, the main banking unit of Bank of Boston, said it is raising its prime lending rate to 7.75 pct from 7.50 pct, effective immediately. Reuter
